jobDescription: A core team member/leader role focused on Technology Risk transformation, Ethical Hacking, Cyber Security, and IT Audit. Responsibilities include stakeholder engagement, process summarization, business process evaluation, solution development, IT and business process optimization, staying updated on IT advancements, conducting presentations, requirements analysis, and communication with cross-functional teams and management.
preferredQualifications: Hands-on experience with JavaScript or Python
gpaCriteria: 60% throughout X, XII, Graduation with no backlog
benefitsOffered: Comprehensive medical insurance coverage for staff and family
Expansive general and accidental coverage for staff
